metadata.title: Feed the children and the families — Omotani CARING Foundation
metadata.ogTitle: Feed the children and the families — Omotani CARING Foundation
metadata.ogDescription: Moses and Elizabeth were able to complete the latest purchase of food and soap and other items for distribution to Bwindi Plus School’s children, teachers, Batwa, porters and other needy families.

sections.text: Feed the children and the families
Moses and Elizabeth were able to complete the latest purchase of food and soap and other items for distribution to Bwindi Plus School’s children, teachers, Batwa, porters and other needy families.
